cast.overview: Against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel's First Family is forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, while defending Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer.
cast.title: The Fantastic 4: First Steps

details.biography:
Cecilia Blair is a young British Actor. In 2024 Cecilia joined the cast of an exciting Studio Feature Film due for release on Netflix in 2025.

She plays the role of Young Lucy in "The Devil's Hour", the TV series produced by Hartswood Films for Amazon Prime Video, starring Peter Capaldi, and Jessica Raine. "The Devil's Hour" has been nominated for an International Emmy Award 2023 for Best Drama.
details.name: Cecilia Blair
